segments.text: From my view, the window frames a tidy yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and a path look inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman's routine seems calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflowing sink tells another story.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She'll slip if she moves wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the kids' adventure catches my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, grabbing cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's participation makes it teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong shift and down he goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels on the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope it ends without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR
